title: IBM Equal Access Karma Accessibility Checker
creator: IBM Accessibility
description: Karma plugin that performs integrated accessibility testing within a continuous integration pipeline such as Travis CI. Scans HTML nodes/widgets, URLs, local files, HTML documents, and HTML content in the form of a string. Provides framework to validate results against baseline or fail test case.
guideline: WCAG 2.1 — W3C Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.1
WCAG 2.0 — W3C Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.0
Section 508, <abbr title="United States">US</abbr> federal procurement standard
automated: Groups of web pages or web sites
